body:
Hey guys,
Endertait here with another video!
This one is showing you what puts me off this pvp server!
Anyway here it is: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xSqhqOARn3g
Don't forget to comment with any tips, like or even SUBSCRIBE :)
Anyway thanks for your support,
Endertait.

title: New Video - Dont you just hate bow spammers?
